tool_description: Get workout exercises for every muscle group. See more info at https://api-ninjas.com/api/exercises.
title: Exercises by API-Ninjas

api_list.name: /v1/exercises
api_list.description: API Ninjas Exercises API endpoint. Returns up to 10 exercises that satisfy the given parameters.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: number of results to offset for pagination. Default is 0.

parameters.name: muscle
parameters.description:
muscle group targeted by the exercise. Possible values are:

abdominals
abductors
adductors
biceps
calves
chest
forearms
glutes
hamstrings
lats
lower_back
middle_back
neck
quadriceps
traps
triceps

parameters.name: type
parameters.description:
exercise type. Possible values are:

cardio
olympic_weightlifting
plyometrics
powerlifting
strength
stretching
strongman

parameters.name: difficulty
parameters.description:
difficulty level of the exercise. Possible values are:

beginner
intermediate
expert

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: name of exercise. This value can be partial (e.g. press will match Dumbbell Bench Press)

utterances.utterance: Can you give me some beginner exercises for the chest?
What are some expert-level plyometrics exercises?
Show me some strength exercises for the lower back.
I need a list of intermediate exercises targeting the glutes.
Find some cardio exercises for the calves.
What are some powerlifting exercises for the quadriceps?
Can you suggest some stretching exercises for the neck?
Give me a list of strongman exercises for the forearms.
What are some exercises for the hamstrings?
Show me some olympic weightlifting exercises for the lats.
